Organizing your home screen and creating folders for your camera and video editing apps is a great idea!

Scanning documents and receipts is an essential task, and there are some excellent apps that can help you do so with ease. Here are some top-rated document scanning apps that are compatible with your Samsung Galaxy S22:

1. **CamScanner**: A popular and highly-rated app that scans documents, receipts, and even whiteboards. It offers features like auto-edge detection, OCR (optical character recognition), and cloud storage integration. (Free, with in-app purchases)
2. **Scanbot**: A fast and easy-to-use app that scans documents, receipts, and QR codes. It offers features like automatic document detection, OCR, and cloud storage integration. (Free, with in-app purchases)
3. **Adobe Scan**: A powerful app from Adobe that scans documents, receipts, and business cards. It offers features like automatic document detection, OCR, and integration with Adobe's cloud services. (Free, with in-app purchases)
4. **Genius Scan**: A highly-rated app that scans documents, receipts, and whiteboards. It offers features like automatic document detection, OCR, and cloud storage integration. (Free, with in-app purchases)
5. **TinyScan**: A lightweight and easy-to-use app that scans documents, receipts, and QR codes. It offers features like automatic document detection, OCR, and cloud storage integration. (Free, with in-app purchases)

All of these apps are available on the Google Play Store and are compatible with your Samsung Galaxy S22. You can try out a few to see which one works best for you.

When choosing a document scanning app, consider the following factors:

* **Ease of use**: Look for an app with an intuitive interface that makes it easy to scan and save documents.
* **Image quality**: Choose an app that produces high-quality scans with clear text and images.
* **OCR capabilities**: If you need to extract text from your scans, look for an app with built-in OCR capabilities.
* **Cloud storage integration**: Consider an app that integrates with cloud storage services like Google Drive, Dropbox, or OneDrive for easy access to your scanned documents.
* **Security**: Look for an app that offers secure scanning and storage options, especially if you're dealing with sensitive documents.

I hope this helps you find the perfect document scanning app for your Samsung Galaxy S22!
